translations: 纯洁的；不懂世故的；不精细的；天真无邪的；质朴无华的

sentences.sentence: It was music which unsophisticated audiences enjoyed listening to.
sentences.translation: 这是那些不懂世故的听众喜欢听的音乐。

sentences.sentence: The cattle herders had only a few possessions: unsophisticated pots and polished adzes.
sentences.translation: 牧民们只有几样东西：一些并不精致的陶罐和磨光的斧子。

sentences.sentence: He was so genuine and unsophisticated that no introduction would serve to introduce him, more than if you introduced a woodchuck to your neighbor.
sentences.translation: 他是这样单纯、毫不虚伪，无需用介绍的方式来介绍他，正如你无需给你的邻居介绍土拨鼠一样。
